bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there are foldable object and soft object together, don't pack a foldable object into the box
goals.3: If there is a fragile object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: you should never pick and place a box
rules.2: if there is a foldable object, you must fold the object neither it is packed or not
rules.3: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out of the rigid object and replace it into the bin
rules.4: you must push a soft object in the bin
